goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 382 KB)
graph_title: Percentage in employment in specific industries
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
indicator_available: Percentage in employment who are science, research, engineering and technology profesionals and Percentage in employment who are science, engineering and technology associate professionals
computation_definitions: Data is using Standard Occupation Classification (2010).Science, Research, Engineering and Technology professionals is based on Sub Major Group 21 and Science, Engineering and Technology associate proffesionals on Sub Major Group 31
source_other_info_1: Use Jan 20xx - Dec 20xx as annual figures
